comment.body:
The description of the Adguard reporting system recommends "Stich It!" as a means of taking long screenshots.
However, when I used it, a screenshot containing many ads and pictures with Adguard turned off was too large in data size to attach it.
The error message did not give me the correct information. It said the "URL is invalid".
I think the support team should change the error message to something appropriate and also specify the maximum data size of the file on the form.
I also think you should review the maximum size of attachments if possible.
This restriction prevents us from attaching screenshots of the same resolution of the same page.

comment.body:
Hi,

>When I have you ON on my iPhone on this webshop I cannot accept the cookies pop up. It won’t go away when press accept.

Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce this issue, so it's probably caused by one of the third-party filters:
```
Adblock Warning Removal List
Fanboy's Annoyances
Web Annoyances Ultralist
I don't care about cookies
EasyList Cookie List
Dandelion Sprout's Annoyances List
```
Please try to disable them and then check if issue still occurs.

<hr>

I have added additional rules to hide cookie notice and unblock scroll, filters update should be available in 1-2 hours.
